turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, do you think you could order me a pizza from Mineo's please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course. What kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you get me John's Special Pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That has Pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, green peppers & sausage on it. Is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, could you replace the sausage with ham?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they can do that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, good. I hate sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How many cuts are in each size again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A small is 8 cuts and a large is 12 cuts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What size is a Sicilian?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A sicilian is 16", so it is also 12 cuts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have a small Sicilian?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, they don't. They only offer Sicilian style pizza as a large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I guess a large is fine then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the Sicilian style crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so you want a large Sicilian John's Special pizza with ham instead of sausage from Mineo's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes. The receipt has been texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you go pick it up, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, I'll get ready to leave.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!
